name: places/ChIJL9ekiINYwokR9VCdhdzHXGw
formattedAddress: 203 W 87th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 203 W 87th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
Where to start. Firstly, we love our new hardwood floors. They look awesome.
Secondly, Anthony and Cesar’s patience with us was phenomenal. We had some co-op board requirements to navigate with all sorts of codes and I have never done anything like this before. Anthony was so patient and diligent and got it all done whilst dealing with my ding dong questions.
Cesar headed the actual installation and he was a gentleman and so professional from start to finish. We had all of our furniture they had to work around and I truly don’t know how they did it.
Anyway! Highly recommend. Solid guys and beautiful work.

originalText.text:
Make Ready NYC did a fantastic job with flooring, interior painting, and other renovations in my Manhattan apartment!  I live out-of-state and could not be there to check on the work as it progressed. When I saw the finished work, Anthony and his team had done everything beautifully--just as he had laid out and described to me.  Thank you Anthony and the Make Ready team!

Kurt C.

originalText.text: I had an excellent experience with Make Ready NYC. Their transparency in providing an accurate labor quote, time estimate for completion, and a realistic start date was greatly appreciated. They delivered on their promises, completing the project within budget and leaving the site clean and prepared. I will definitely turn to them for future apartment remodel projects without hesitation.

text.text: I had an excellent experience with Make Ready NYC. Their transparency in providing an accurate labor quote, time estimate for completion, and a realistic start date was greatly appreciated. They delivered on their promises, completing the project within budget and leaving the site clean and prepared. I will definitely turn to them for future apartment remodel projects without hesitation.

originalText.text: Anthony and Make Ready NYC were fantastic from start to finish. Anthony was extremely responsive throughout the entire process. He was very fair with pricing and made sure to give an accurate timeline. Most importantly, the floors, painting and tile work was excellent quality that will last a very long time. We are proud to show our apartment off because of Anthony and his team. You can't go wrong in Manhattan by using Make Ready NYC.

We are proud to show our apartment off because of Anthony and his team. You can't go wrong in Manhattan by using Make Ready NYC.

originalText.text: Anthony and his team were incredibly efficient and thorough! They were extremely accommodating and still managed to finish ahead of schedule. We're so grateful for their help and the care they took in moving around furniture and valuable office equipment. I couldn't recommend them enough!
